name: Youtubers Life - Fashion
description:
Youtubers Life is the best selling life simulation/tycoon videogame on iOS. Become the world’s greatest content creator in history by editing videos, expanding the number of fans and turning yourself into a wealthy fellow. With the NEW Fashion Channel, you can now engage with your audience in fun, new ways. Experience how cool it is to become a top model, taylor every aspect of your personal life or design your own clothes. How long will it take you to be featured on the cover of the most important fashion magazines?

Buy and design your own outfits
You will have to combine different styles and colors, always keeping in mind how they suit the time of the year! Clothes will be defined by style, color, season and brand so you can show your unique taste to the whole planet.

Attend fashion events to become a celebrity
Dress properly if you want to make it to that fashion magazine cover! But don't forget that you are here to work: interview celebrities and record video blogs to show your fans that you are attending that super hip event.

Become the next top model
Pick the best outfit and share the runway with the world's top models in this fun mini-game! Convince the world's top brands that you are suited to show their latest designs on the runway while getting richer and raising your subscribers
